text: Two motorcyclists snatched a nine-sovereign chain from Suseela (28), wife of Ganesh, at knifepoint at the Tamil Nadu Housing Board Colony in KTC Nagar (East) here on Wednesday. The victim was riding a two-wheeler. The culprits, who followed her on a motorcycle, intercepted her and snatched the chain. Based on a complaint lodged her, Sipcot police have registered a case under Section 392 of IPC.
title: Chain snatched at knifepoint
